vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: LibOrder.hashOrder (IExchangeCore.sol#164-210) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
LibOrder.hashOrder uses assembly (IExchangeCore.sol#164-210)
	- IExchangeCore.sol#189-209

vulnerability_findings.name: pragma
vulnerability_findings.message:
Different versions of Solidity is used in IExchangeCore.sol:
	- Version used: ['0.4.24', 'ABIEncoderV2']
	- IExchangeCore.sol#21 declares pragma solidity0.4.24
	- IExchangeCore.sol#90 declares pragma solidity0.4.24
	- IExchangeCore.sol#215 declares pragma solidity0.4.24
	- IExchangeCore.sol#322 declares pragma solidity0.4.24
	- IExchangeCore.sol#376 declares pragma solidity0.4.24
	- IExchangeCore.sol#377 declares pragma experimentalABIEncoderV2

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: IExchangeCore.fillOrder (IExchangeCore.sol#393-399) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: IExchangeCore.cancelOrder (IExchangeCore.sol#403-404) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.message: IExchangeCore.getOrderInfo (IExchangeCore.sol#410-413) should be declared external

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Variable 'LibEIP712.EIP712_DOMAIN_HASH' (IExchangeCore.sol#45) is not in mixedCase
